data: judy is going to have a birthday party.
she is ten years old.
she wanted a hammer and saw for presents.
then she could make a coat rack
and fix her doll house.
she asked her father
to get them for her.
her father did not want to get them for her.
he did not think that girls should play with a hammer and a saw.
but he wanted to get her something.
so he bought her a beautiful new dress.
judy liked the dress
but she still wanted the hammer and saw.
later she told grandmother about her wish.
her grandmother knew that judy really wanted a hammer and a saw.
she decided to get them for her
because when judy grows up
and becomes a woman
she will have to fix things
when they break.
then her grandmother went out that very day
and bought the tools for judy.
she gave them to judy that night.
judy was very happy.
now she could build things with her hammer and saw.
stories.title: Judy
